mapper.insert: insert into product_review(pr_buyer, pr_seller, pr_p_number, pr_score, pr_content) values (#{pr_buyer}, #{pr_seller}, #{pr_p_number}, #{pr_score}, #{pr_content})
mapper.select: select count(pr_number) from product_review where pr_isDel=0 and pr_seller=#{pr_seller}
select * from (select pr_number from product_review where pr_isDel=0 order by pr_number desc limit #{pageStart}, #{qty}) a left join product_review b on a.pr_number = b.pr_number
